description: Rada Miskovic quietly meets with trusted engineers and storytellers at Bar 101. She proposes formalizing the mythic 'Halden Echoes' into a civic AI oracle to help guide a city shaken by BCI failures.
During a special broadcast, Rada introduces the city to the idea of the Halden Echoes oracle—presenting it as a tool for collective wisdom and reform in the wake of systemic turmoil.
With grassroots support, the Halden Echoes civic oracle is launched as an accessible AI, opening real-time forums for public questions about justice, BCI abuses, and social reform.
Growing crowds gather nightly to pose questions to the oracle. The cryptic but inspiring responses quickly circulate, fueling open debate and encouraging citizen-led solutions across Stenograd.

Council factions meet in emergency session, divided over how to confront the oracle's influence. With residents openly following its advice over official directives, authority within Stenograd begins to fracture.
